item.description:
You asked for it you got it.

Tully Lake Saturday June 26th. Butts in boat at 9:30 AM.

We will start from the boat launch on Doanes Hill Road, Royalston. Google it for directions.

This is a nice slow moving river suitable for beginners. We will go up river from the landing to Long Pond.
I am not sure that we will continue further up river from there since there are several beaver dams. We will then return to the landing. I plan on paddling into the lake after that. You can make this day as long as you want or just a few hours. The last time I was out there we were in the boats for over 6 hours, it is up to you as to how long you want to enjoy this beautiful lake. Please have water and a lunch with you. PDF's are required. There is limited parking at the boat launch.

THIS IS NOT THE BOAT LAUNCH AT THE DAM. This is the launch near the camp ground.
item.name: Tully Lake
